trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Web.ApplicationServices" /> namespace provides classes that enable you to access ASP.NET forms authentication, roles, and profiles application services as Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="N:System.Web.ApplicationServices" /> namespace fornece classes que permitem que você acesse serviços de aplicativos de perfis, funções e autenticação de formulários do ASP.NET como serviços da WCF (Windows Communication Foundation).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>, and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService> classes contain methods that let you log on users, check which roles the current user belongs to, and retrieve profile properties for the user through WCF services.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>, e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService> classes contêm métodos que permitem a você fazer logon de usuários, verifique quais funções de usuário atual pertence e recuperar propriedades de perfil para o usuário por meio de serviços do WCF.

trans-unit.source: The namespace also includes the following classes:
trans-unit.target: O namespace também inclui as seguintes classes:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs>, which is used to customize the authentication cookie from the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs>, que é usado para personalizar o cookie de autenticação de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs>, which is used to select the membership provider at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs>, que é usado para selecionar o provedor de associação em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs>, which is used to select the role provider at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs>, que é usado para selecionar o provedor de função em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs>, which is used to create custom validation for user profile properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs>, que é usada para criar propriedades do perfil de validação personalizada para o usuário.
